snippet: Pernilla Lindberg holed birdie putts of 40 and 50 feet and added three 25-footers in a round of seven-under 64 to take a two-shot lead at the Jamie Farr Toledo Classic in Sylvania, Ohio. Lindberg, 26, has not finished in the top 10 of an L.P.G.A....
lead_paragraph: Pernilla Lindberg holed birdie putts of 40 and 50 feet and added three 25-footers in a round of seven-under 64 to take a two-shot lead at the Jamie Farr Toledo Classic in Sylvania, Ohio. Lindberg, 26, has not finished in the top 10 of an L.P.G.A. event in her 36 starts as a pro.
